name: CONNEXESS
description:
What if rules of Connect 4 and Chess were combined? Connexess would be the result.

A local 2-player game where a player's goal is to line up their pieces either horizontally, vertically or diagonally. Each piece is a different class, such as the Archer, and each have their own movement pattern and skill to add more strategy to the game.

Think 3 or 4 moves ahead and come out the victor!
